text: Lighthouse is the first album by the Georgian alternative rock band, Loudspeakers. It was released on 4 March 2015. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== * Levan Tskhvaradze – electric guitar, vocals * Levan Mamaladze – bass * Sandro Tsiklauri – keyboards * Dato Tsomaia – drums * Recorded and mixed by Gvaji ==References== Category:2015 debut albums
title: Lighthouse (Loudspeakers album)
